description:
"Throw it! Dinosaur Panic" is a dinosaur dropping game that anyone can enjoy!

Press the button to throw the dinosaurs!
Hold down the button to throw as much as you can!!

The dinosaurs that fall into the tray will come to play in Dinosaur Land.
Collect all the dinosaurs!

If you hit the same dinosaur, the dinosaur will get bigger and bigger.
If you drop a big dinosaur, you have a chance to get a high score!

The fun roulette that appears while throwing is
If you drop a rainbow egg, a new dinosaur will appear!
If you get a gold dinosaur, a silver dinosaur, or a fever, you're super lucky!

But be careful of the Blacksaurus!
If you drop it into the tray, it will cause damage.

Let's throw various dinosaurs!

"Throw it! Dinosaur Panic" can be enjoyed in four modes.

"One Player with no time limit"
No time limit!
Take your time and get lots of dinosaurs!

"One Player with time limit"
How many points can you get in a short amount of time?
Let's do our best with luck on our side!

"Two Player with time limit"
Share the controller and work together to get a high score!

"Dinosaur Land"
After playing, take a look at Dinosaur Land.
The dinosaurs you've caught are coming to play.
Touch the screen or press the buttons and enjoy the dinosaurs' reactions!
In the Dinosaur list, you can see the dinosaurs as they grow one by one.
Get all 32 dinosaurs and complete the Dinosaur list!
name: Throw it! Dinosaur Panic
intro:
Throw it here! Throw it here!
A dinosaur drop game!
